item.description: http://www.facebook.c... Spreading the Revolution one bar at a time! Please join us in spreading the good Dr.’s word. 7:00-8:30 Margarita’s 1037 Elm St Manchester NH *Please consider dining at our first stop for dinner or join at 8:00 the official kick off to our crawl 8:45-9:15 Shaskeen 909 Elm St *Specials: $3 Drafts $4 Guinness 9:30-10:00 Penuche's 96 Hanover St *Specials: All drafts $3 10:15-10:45 Strange Brew 88 Market St 11:00-11:30 McGarvey's 1097 Elm St *Specials: $1 off mixed drinks, .50 cents off beer Wear your Ron Paul swag and enjoy drink specials at most participating bars. We do request that if you choose to exercise your 2nd Amendment right, it is in a concealed fashion. The press has been invited and we don’t want them to focus solely on open carrying, which we all know they would. This is to bring attention to out pouring of support for Ron Paul that is being mostly ignored. Tip cards will be available to leave your servers to spread the message of H1139 “Keep Your Tips Act” sponsored by Dr. Paul. Free parking is available in parking lots on Lowell St. and the parking garage on Kasciusko/Elm St. which is right next to our last stop McGarvey’s. http://www.facebook.c...
item.name: Ron Paul Pub Crawl-New Hampshire Edition
